content.text1: Being together looks a little different these days, but we still value coming together online to celebrate. Join us online as we explore the loneliness Jesus experienced in his death and how his life brings us all together.

Let's get together online at 10:00am this Good Friday April 10 and on Easter Sunday April 12. Our livestream services will be 70 minutes long with music, communion, stories, teaching, and reflecting on the meaning of Jesus' death and resurrection.
